> The only thing I didn't like about the Pretenders was that they only 
> moved at the shoulder. they wouldve been more oopular if they were a 
> little bigger and moved at the elbows, hips, knees, and maybe even 
> the neck.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Yeah, they need a storage spot for their weapons. I don't know, the 
> pretenders were just never that great to me, because they had those 
> shells...
